name: Tower Island
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Cassie Hui  and Anna Rippert 

Tower Island

Help save the trapped Mermaid at the top of the tower! But be aware, the tower contains dangerous out- of- the- sea monsters that will try to stop you from saving the Mermaid.

AD = to aim your spear

SPACE = to shoot your spear

ARROW KEYS = to control the movement of the player
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
